title: General Knowledge
description: Explore solar system, environment, country facts, and good habits for Class 1 students.

subtopics.title: Our Solar System
subtopics.content:
## Solar System Facts

- The sun is a big ball of fire.
- Earth goes around the Sun.
- Moon goes around the Earth.
- There are 8 planets in our solar system.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Solar Questions:
- What is the sun?
- What orbits the sun?
- How many planets?

### Practice:
- True/false facts
- Label sun, earth, moon
- Count planets

subtopics.title: Our Environment
subtopics.content:
## Environment

- Trees give oxygen, fruits, and shade.
- Animals live in forests, farms, or homes.
- Water is used for drinking, cooking, cleaning.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Environment Questions:
- What do trees give?
- Where do animals live?
- Uses of water?

### Practice:
- List tree benefits
- Animal homes
- Water uses

subtopics.title: My Country
subtopics.content:
## India Facts

- Name of country: India.
- National flag: saffron, white, green.
- National animal: Tiger.
- National bird: Peacock.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Country Questions:
- What is our country?
- Flag colors?
- National animal?

### Practice:
- Identify symbols
- Flag colors
- List national symbols

subtopics.title: Good Habits
subtopics.content:
## Good Habits

- Brush your teeth twice a day.
- Wash your hands before eating.
- Always say 'Please' and 'Thank you'.
subtopics.codeExample:
### Habit Questions:
- How often to brush teeth?
- When to wash hands?
- What polite words to say?

### Practice:
- List daily habits
- True/false habit statements
- Match habits to pictures
